aboutCarlusion.heading: About CARLUSION
aboutCarlusion.content: Carlusion stands for innovation and maximum user-friendliness in car sales. It was important to us to include all the essential functions in the industry and make them as intuitive as possible. Our software provides car sellers and garages with the perfect solution for efficiency and success.
aboutCarlusion.subHeading: We are a Trusted Name in Auto Industry
aboutCarlusion.subContent: Visited by Million of Car Buyers Every Month!
aboutCarlusion.descriptionOne: We proudly stand for quality, innovation, and reliability that our customers have valued for years. Our software has been specifically developed to meet the unique requirements of car sellers and garages. Our goal is to simplify your work processes and free you up to focus on what truly matters.
aboutCarlusion.descriptionTwo: With Carlusion, you get a solution that is not only powerful but also easy to use. It was particularly important to us to integrate all essential functions into our software and make them as user-friendly as possible. Trust a software that offers real added value and gives you a competitive advantage.

featureCards.heading: 10 Years in Business
featureCards.content: A decade of experience and expertise.Trust in software that has proven itself and grows with the demands of the industry.

featureCards.heading: Trusted by Millions
featureCards.content: Our software is the first choice for car sellers and garages. Proven, reliable, and designed to drive your success.

featureCards.heading: Leading in Innovation
featureCards.content: Find the best deals for every budget. Our software helps you offer vehicles at fair and competitive prices.

CarActionCards.buyContent: Find your dream car with our vast inventory, advanced search filters, and comparison tools, ensuring you make an informed decision.

aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.content: We are revolutionizing car sales with innovative software. With years of experience and a passion for efficiency, we provide garages and car dealers with the tools they need for sustainable success.

ImageContentCard.heading: OUR MISSON & VALUES
ImageContentCard.content: Our mission is to provide innovative and user-friendly solutions that optimize the vehicle sales process and drive our customers' success. We strive to create a sustainable, efficient, and transparent platform that benefits both dealers and buyers.

pointsArray.pointContent: We constantly strive to integrate the best and latest technologies to meet market demands.
Our success is measured by the satisfaction of our customers. We are committed to exceeding their expectations.
We build trust through transparency, honesty, and reliable services.
We promote sustainable practices, both in our technology and in our business practices.

featuresArray.heading: Vehicle Management
featuresArray.content: Vehicle management is an essential aspect of optimizing fleet operations and ensuring the smooth functioning of transportation services.

featuresArray.heading: Contract Management
featuresArray.content: Effective contract management is crucial for maintaining compliance, mitigating risks, and optimizing business relationships.

featuresArray.heading: Financial Management / Annual Reports
featuresArray.content: Financial management plays a pivotal role in the strategic planning and operational success of any organization.

featuresArray.heading: Customer Management
featuresArray.content: Effective customer management is essential for building strong relationships and driving business growth.

featuresArray.heading: Inventory Management
featuresArray.content: Effective inventory management is crucial for optimizing operations and maximizing profitability in any business.

featuresArray.heading: Inquiry Management
featuresArray.content: Inquiry management is a vital component of customer relationship management that ensures timely and effective responses to customer inquiries.

featuresArray.heading: Quotation Management
featuresArray.content: Streamline your quoting process with our intuitive system, generating accurate and professional quotes in minutes.

featuresArray.heading: Calendar for Appointments and Scheduling

featuresArray.heading: Payments

DetailsPresentationCard.heading: Detailed presentation of the functions and software
DetailsPresentationCard.contentOne: CARLUSION is an innovative solution specifically designed to simplify the daily work of car dealerships and garages. Our approach was to create a platform that is not only powerful but also user-friendly, covering all essential tasks related to car sales.
DetailsPresentationCard.contentTwo: With our software, you always have a clear overview of your vehicle inventory and all relevant information. The organization and management of customer data are also made efficient, allowing you to quickly and easily respond to individual needs. Creating and tracking contracts or offers is also simplified through our optimized features, saving time and effort.
DetailsPresentationCard.contentThree: Furthermore, Carlusion supports you in structuring financial processes, from an overview of revenues to detailed reports for informed planning. Even scheduling is seamlessly integrated into the software, helping you organize your business optimally. A clear inventory overview ensures that you always know the status of your vehicle stock and can make precise decisions.
DetailsPresentationCard.contenFour: Our core idea is clear: we want to provide you with a tool that simplifies processes and helps you work more efficiently and successfully. Carlusion is not just software; it is a reliable companion that takes your daily work to the next level. With a well-thought-out design and versatile features, it offers everything you need for success in the automotive industry.

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
privacyPolicy.content: This content provides a comprehensive overview and serves as a foundation for your Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: This content provides a comprehensive overview and serves as a foundation for your Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. Make sure to review it with a legal expert to ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations.

informationData.title: Information We Collect
informationData.content: The protection of your personal data is a top priority at CARLUSION. With this privacy policy, we want to inform you comprehensively about the data we collect, how we process it, and the measures we take to protect your data. These regulations apply both to the use of our website and to the car sales software we provide.

informationData.title: Log Files
informationData.content: CARLUSION collects personal data solely to enable you to use our services and to continuously improve their quality. This includes information such as your name, email address, residential address, credit card details, and phone number, which you voluntarily provide to us, for example, during registration or when contacting us. In addition, technical data such as your IP address or information about your interaction with our website and software may be automatically collected. This data is used to enhance our services and is never shared with unauthorized third parties without your consent.

informationData.title: Cookies and Web Beacons
informationData.content: We use your data exclusively for clearly defined purposes. This includes providing our software, processing your inquiries, and analyzing usage patterns to better tailor our services to your needs. Your data is stored only for as long as necessary for these purposes and is handled strictly in accordance with legal regulations. CARLUSION employs the latest security standards to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.

informationData.title: Privacy Policies
informationData.content: You have the right to request information about the data we store at any time. If this data is incorrect, you can request its correction, or, in the case of a legitimate interest, you may also request its deletion. We are always available to assist you with any questions or concerns regarding data protection.

informationData.title: Datenschutzrichtlinien
informationData.content: Cookies play an important role on our website in providing you with an optimal user experience. These small files store settings and usage information and help us personalize our services for you. For more information, please refer to our separate cookie policy.

termsofService.heading: Terms of Service
termsofService.content: At Carlusion, your privacy is of the utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our platform. By using Carlusion, you agree to the collection and use of your data in accordance with this policy.

termsOfServicesData.title: Informationen, die wir sammeln
termsOfServicesData.content: The use of the CARLUSION website and software is subject to the following terms and conditions. By accessing our services, you agree to these regulations. Our software has been specifically designed to provide car sellers and garages with a flexible and powerful solution for organizing their daily operations. We expect our users to use the software responsibly and in compliance with applicable legal regulations.

termsOfServicesData.title: Protokolldateien
termsOfServicesData.content: Registration is a prerequisite for using our software. As a registered user, you are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure and protecting them from unauthorized access. Any form of misuse, whether through false information or actions that violate applicable laws, is strictly prohibited.

termsOfServicesData.title: Cookies and Web Beacons
termsOfServicesData.content: Our software offers a variety of features designed to optimize your workflows. These include managing vehicles, contracts, and customer data, as well as generating financial overviews and reports. All these features are available to you as part of the provided services; however, CARLUSION does not guarantee the continuous availability of the software. Maintenance work or technical disruptions may temporarily restrict access.

termsOfServicesData.title: Datenschutzrichtlinien
termsOfServicesData.content: The security of your data is important to us. However, CARLUSION assumes no liability for damages resulting from improper use of the software or unforeseen technical issues. It is your responsibility to regularly create backup copies of your data to prevent any loss.

termsOfServicesData.title: Datenschutzrichtlinien
termsOfServicesData.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms of use at any time. Significant changes will be communicated to you in a timely manner via our website or by email. If you do not agree with the changes, you are free to discontinue the use of our services.

termsOfServicesData.title: Datenschutzrichtlinien
termsOfServicesData.content: All legal matters related to the use of CARLUSION services are governed by the laws of the country where our company is based. The jurisdiction for any legal disputes is Switzerland. If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms of use, you can contact our customer support at any time.
